long_description: Streamline your bike commute with the Timbuk2 Especial Claro messenger bag. It protects your gear from the elements and looks great on and off the bike thanks to its lightweight, sophisticated design. Exterior is built to last with tarpaulin and heavy-duty stitching; water-resistant lining keeps contents protected and makes clean up a breeze. Oversize top flap accommodates different volumes and adjustable flap construction allows for roll-top or rip-and-stick flap closure. Internal padded pocket fits a 15 in. laptop; messenger bag offers secure internal organization for your smaller stuff. Adjustable, padded shoulder strap personalizes the fit so you can ride without the weight shifting unexpectedly; flexible cooling panel maximizes airflow while riding. Strap buckles allows for one-handed adjustments, perfect for making small changes while pedaling. Timbuk2 Especial Claro messenger bag features reflective panels to increase visibility.
short_description: Streamline your bike commute with the Timbuk2 Especial Claro messenger bag. It protects your gear from the elements and looks great on and off the bike thanks to its lightweight, sophisticated design.
